brand.pageDescription: Learn about Éclat du teint, a trusted dermocosmetic brand specializing in sensitive and problematic skin care, recognized by international skin care professionals.

hero.title: Sensitive Skin is Our Specialty
hero.subtitle: Sensitive skin is the specialty of "Éclat du teint".

intro.title: Sensitive Skin is Our Specialty
intro.subtitle: Sensitive skin is the specialty of "Éclat du teint".
intro.paragraph1: A trusted dermocosmetic for sensitive/troubled skin care, recognized by international dermatology experts, and cooperating with over 2,000 international specialized skin institutions.
intro.paragraph2: Through continuous research for post-treatment care and problematic skin management, we have been introducing soothing care products.
intro.paragraph3: Our clinical skincare manufactured in Korea is used by dermatologists, plastic surgeons, and medical spas to complement daily home care and aesthetic procedures. We formulate to correct signs of aging, protect healthy skin, and prevent future damage.

professionals.title: The Choice of Doctors and Skincare Professionals
professionals.description: Doctors and skincare professionals define cosmeceuticals as cutting-edge products between cosmetics and pharmaceuticals. The active ingredients in cosmeceuticals are expected to be clinically proven to enhance skincare efficacy. Éclat du teint products are crafted with elegant formulations for customized skincare regimens, providing scientifically proven skin improvement effects.

postTreatment.title: Post-Treatment Specialist Brand
postTreatment.description: A trusted dermocosmetic for sensitive/troubled skin care, recognized by international dermatology experts, and cooperating with over 2,000 international specialized skin institutions.

partnership.title: Customized Partnership
partnership.description: Éclat du teint is partnering with an increasing number of luxury spas. Each spa has its own unique characteristics and preferences, and the Éclat du teint expert team is ready to support all spas. The company's long-term commitment to creating new spas and participation in spas undergoing transformation has prepared us to provide customized solutions and ensure successful transitions.

customized.title: Customized Partnership
customized.description: Éclat du teint is partnering with an increasing number of luxury spas. Each spa has its own unique characteristics and preferences, and the Éclat du teint expert team is ready to support all spas. The company's long-term commitment to creating new spas and participation in spas undergoing transformation has prepared us to provide customized solutions and ensure successful transitions.

professionals.heading: The Choice of Doctors and Skincare Professionals
professionals.paragraph1: Doctors and skincare professionals define cosmeceuticals as cutting-edge products between cosmetics and pharmaceuticals. The active ingredients in cosmeceuticals are expected to be clinically proven to enhance skincare efficacy.
professionals.paragraph2: Éclat du teint products are crafted with elegant formulations for customized skincare regimens, providing scientifically proven skin improvement effects.

postTreatment.heading: Post-Treatment Specialist Brand
postTreatment.paragraph: A trusted dermocosmetic for sensitive/troubled skin care, recognized by international dermatology experts, and cooperating with over 2,000 international specialized skin institutions.

partnership.heading: Customized Partnership
partnership.paragraph1: Éclat du teint is partnering with an increasing number of luxury spas. Each spa has its own unique characteristics and preferences, and the Éclat du teint expert team is ready to support all spas.
partnership.paragraph2: The company's long-term commitment to creating new spas and participation in spas undergoing transformation has prepared us to provide customized solutions and ensure successful transitions.

research.title: Continuous Research
research.description: Through ongoing research, we develop soothing care products for post-treatment care and problematic skin management.

trust.title: Professional Trust
trust.description: Recognized and trusted by dermatologists, plastic surgeons, and skincare professionals worldwide.

quality.title: Clinical Excellence
quality.description: Scientifically proven formulations that deliver real skin improvement results with elegant textures.
